title: IModelDocExtension.SketchBoxSelect
description: Box selects all of the entities in a sketch within the specified coordinates of the selection box.
signature:
System.Boolean SketchBoxSelect( 
   System.Double
FirstPtX
,
   System.Double
FirstPtY
,
   System.Double
FirstPtZ
,
   System.Double
SecondPtX
,
   System.Double
SecondPtY
,
   System.Double
SecondPtZ
)

parameters.name: FirstPtX
parameters.description: x coordinate of the first corner of the box

parameters.name: FirstPtY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the first corner of the box

parameters.name: FirstPtZ
parameters.description: z coordinate of the first corner of the box

parameters.name: SecondPtX
parameters.description: x coordinate of the opposite diagonal corner of the box

parameters.name: SecondPtY
parameters.description: y coordinate of the opposite diagonal corner of the box

parameters.name: SecondPtZ
parameters.description: z coordinate of the opposite diagonal corner of the box

returns: True if the sketch entities lying in the specified coordinates are box-selected, false if not
